input.sentences: i went on an amazing hike today .
i found a small cave to crawl into .
the highlight was this amazing waterfall .
at the end of the hike i sat down and enjoyed this beautiful river . i ca n't wait to do this again .
output.sentences: We found a cave and crawled into it.
The waterfall was the amazing highlight of the hike.
At the river, we sat and waited.
